channel.title: Question
channel.description: I was just wondering couldn't you use a long instead of an int for items so you can get much more of em like only 3.4 billion with int but over 4 quadrillion with a long? Does anyone do this or has done this? also dose not Jagex use a long for storing the high scores because Suomi is over 4 billion ?

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

Yeh, its possible but as Native said you will have to change a lot of packets so the longs would display correctly.

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @Native1 Native^
item.description:
@Native1 wrote:

[quote=“Crown2, post:1, topic:436669”]I was just wondering couldn’t you use a long instead of an int for items so you can get much more of em like only 3.4 billion with int but over 4 quadrillion with a long? Does anyone do this or has done this?
also dose not Jagex use a long for storing the high scores because Suomi is over 4 billion ?[/quote]
client sided and server sided. you’ll need to change the packets etc.

Read full topic
